p: Time has come for the paper review process of the {Config->confAcronym} conference. So far {Config->nb_papers} papers have been submitted. Here are the instruction on downloading the papers that you have been assigned, as well as how to provide you reviews:

ol.li: First log in the system at {Config->submissionURL}.
PLEASE CHECK that you can properly download and print each assigned paper.
Each paper in your list comes with a "Submit my review" link. Use it to access your review form. You can return latter and modify you review if needed.

p: If we have assigned a paper to you which you feel is a conflict of interest, please let us know right away and we will correct the problem.

Recall that the deadline for submitting your review is the {Config->reviewDeadline} Please don't be in late, since we must provide sufficient time for discussion between the reviewers in order to resolve any significant differences between the reviews.
